snippet.title: Lucius: Gamescom Trailer
snippet.description:
See the first scenes of the new PC game Lucius and watch gameplay as the son of the devil slowly assassinates his targets.

IGN's YouTube is just a taste of our content! Check out our other game channels:

Call of Duty - http://youtube.com/callofdutyign
Zelda - http://youtube.com/zeldaign
Battlefield - http://youtube.com/battlefieldign
Halo - http://youtube.com/haloign
Street Fighter - http://youtube.com/streetfighterign

And more!
